bibdata.title: Topic 1
Features and geometry – Part 1: Feature models
Topic 1 - Features and geometry – Part 1: Feature models
bibdata.abstract: The Implementation Standard Features and geometry – Part 1: Feature models describes how geographic information in datasets and databases using a feature model are structured, created, stored, queried and manipulated. URLs in this document are identifiers of structural elements of a standard, such as requirements, tests, requirement classes, and conformances test suites.
